name: Zammad Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Zammad Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Zammad API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Zammad API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: tokenAuth

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: user

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many users
Get Self (值: getSelf) - Retrieve currently logged-in user

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization Name | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.description: User to retrieve. Specify an ID using an expression.
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: User to retrieve. Specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: organization (值: None) - Name of the organization to assign to the user. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
verified (值: None) - Whether the user has been verified
vip (值: None) - Whether the user is a Very Important Person

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: organization (值: None) - Name of the organization to assign to the user. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
verified (值: None) - Whether the user has been verified
vip (值: None) - Whether the user is a Very Important Person

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

title.name: title
title.description: Title of the ticket to create
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the ticket to create | (必填项)

group.name: group
group.description: Group that will own the ticket to create. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
group.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group Name or ID | 作用: Group that will own the ticket to create. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

customer.name: customer
customer.description: Email address of the customer concerned in the ticket to create. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
customer.natural_language_description: 参数名: Customer Email Name or ID | 作用: Email address of the customer concerned in the ticket to create. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

article.name: article
article.natural_language_description: 参数名: Article | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

firstname.name: firstname
firstname.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | (必填项)

lastname.name: lastname
lastname.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: query (值: None) - Query to filter results by
